name: kicker
content:
kicker noun [C]
(SPORT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who kicks, especially a player in an American football team whose job is to kick the ball

kicker noun [C]
(SURPRISE)
US informal something surprising: And here’s the real kicker - if you buy one you get the second one free.
